title: BUbreakingHeadlines
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Microsoft releases emergency fix for Sharepoint after cyberattacks
items.description: Microsoft issued an urgent fix after hackers used a "zero-day" exploit to infiltrate its SharePoint software.

items.title: Texas flooding: Governor calls special legislative session for emergency planning
items.description: "We must ensure better preparation in the future," Texas Gov. Greg Abbott said in a statement posted on social media.

items.title: Ford recalls more than 694K Bronco Sport, Escape vehicles due to fuel injector issue
items.description: Ford is recalling more than 694,000 Bronco Sport and Escape vehicles because the fuel injector may crack and leak, which may cause a fire

items.title: Suspect arrested after car crashes into post office and catches fire in San Jose, California
items.description: Authorities say a suspect was arrested after a car crashed into a post office in San Jose, California, causing the building to go up in flames.
